Properties.Name: Id
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier for the new forum. If not specified, a random one is assigned.

Properties.Name: CategoryId
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier of the forum category which the new forum belongs to.

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Summary: The name of the new forum.

Properties.Name: Slug
Properties.Summary: The slug for the new forum.

Properties.Name: Description
Properties.Summary: The description of the new forum.

Properties.Name: PermissionSetId
Properties.Summary:
The unique identifier of the permission set.
            If not assigned, the new forum will inherit the permission set from the forum category.

Properties.Name: SiteId
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier of the Site whose the request belongs to.

Properties.Name: UserId
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier of the User who initiated the request.

Requests.Name: UpdateForum
Requests.Summary: Request that updates the forum details.

Properties.Name: Id
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier of the Forum.

Properties.Name: CategoryId
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier of the Forum Category which the Forum belongs to.

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Summary: The name of the Forum.

Properties.Name: Slug
Properties.Summary:
The Slug of the Forum.
            This value is added to the URL in order to identify the Forum.
            If the Slug is "my-forum-slug", the URL will be something similar to "www.mysite.com/forum/my-forum-slug".

Properties.Name: Description
Properties.Summary:
The description of the Forum.
            This value will be displayed in the index and forum pages if included in the theme.

Properties.Name: SortOrder
Properties.Summary: The sort order which is used to display the forums in the index page.

Properties.Name: TopicsCount
Properties.Summary: The number of topics published.

Properties.Name: RepliesCount
Properties.Summary: The number of replies published.

Properties.Name: Status
Properties.Summary:
The status of the forum.
            Can be either published or deleted.

Properties.Name: PermissionSetId
Properties.Summary:
The unique identifier of the permission set used.
            If it's not assigned, the forum will inherit the permission set fom the forum category.

Properties.Name: LastPostId
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier of the last post published.

Properties.Name: Category
Properties.Summary: Reference to the forum category.

Properties.Name: PermissionSet
Properties.Summary: Reference to the permission set if assigned.

Properties.Name: LastPost
Properties.Summary: Reference to the last post published if any.

Properties.Name: Posts
Properties.Summary: List of published posts.

Methods.Name: New
Methods.Summary: Create an empty forum.

Methods.Name: New
Methods.Summary:
Create a new forum with the given values including a unique identifier.
            The default status is published.

Methods.Name: New
Methods.Summary:
Creates a new forum with the given values.
            The unique identifier is automatically assigned.
            The default status is published.

Methods.Name: UpdateDetails
Methods.Summary:
Updates the details of the forum.
            The values that can be changed are forum category, name, slug, description and permission set.

Methods.Name: UpdateLastPost
Methods.Summary: Updates the unique identifier of the last published post.

Methods.Name: MoveUp
Methods.Summary:
Change the sort order by moving up 1 position.
            It generates an error if sort order is 1.

Methods.Name: MoveDown
Methods.Summary: Change the sort order by moving down 1 position.

Methods.Name: Reorder
Methods.Summary: Replace the sort order with the given value.

Methods.Name: IncreaseTopicsCount
Methods.Summary: Increase the number of topics by 1.

Methods.Name: DecreaseTopicsCount
Methods.Summary:
Decrease the number of topics by 1.
            If the resulting number is less than zero, the value will be set to zero.

Methods.Name: IncreaseRepliesCount
Methods.Summary: Increase the number of replies by 1.

Methods.Name: DecreaseRepliesCount
Methods.Summary:
Decrease the number of replies by 1.
            If the resulting number is less than zero, the value will be set to zero.

Methods.Name: Delete
Methods.Summary:
Set the status as deleted.
            Topics and replies within the forum will no longer be visible.

Methods.Name: PermissionSetName
Methods.Summary: Returns the name of permission set if assigned.

Methods.Name: HasPermissionSet
Methods.Summary: Indicates if a permission set is assigned.

Targets.Name: Forum
Targets.Summary: A forum is a board where users can hold conversations.

Properties.Name: Name

Requests.Name: UpdatePermissionSet
Requests.Summary: Request that updates a permission set.

Properties.Name: Id
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier of the permission set.

Properties.Name: SiteId
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier of the site which the permission set belongs to.

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Summary: The name of the permission set.

Properties.Name: Status
Properties.Summary:
The status of the permission set.
            It could be either published or deleted.

Properties.Name: Permissions
Properties.Summary:
List of permissions.
            Each permission is a combination of a user role and a permission type.
            For example, role Subscriber and type Read which means that only users in the role Subscriber can read the discussions.

Properties.Name: Categories
Properties.Summary: List of forum categories that use the permission set.

Properties.Name: Forums
Properties.Summary: List of forums that use the permission set.

Methods.Name: New
Methods.Summary: Creates an empty permission set.

Methods.Name: New
Methods.Summary:
Creates a new permission set  with the given values.
            The unique identifier is automatically assigned.
            The default status is published.

Methods.Name: New
Methods.Summary:
Creates a new permission set with the given values including a unique identifier.
            The default status is published.

Methods.Name: UpdateDetails
Methods.Summary:
Updates the details of the permission set.
            The values that can be changed are name and permissions.

Methods.Name: Delete
Methods.Summary:
Set the status as deleted.
            The permission set can no longer be used in forum categories and forums.

Targets.Name: PermissionSet
Targets.Summary:
A permission set contains the permissions to read, create or edit forum posts.
            Each permission type such as view forum, read topics or create new posts is assigned to one or more user roles.

Requests.Name: UpdateTopic
Requests.Summary: Request to update a topic.

Properties.Name: Id
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier of the forum post.

Properties.Name: ForumId
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier of the forum.

Properties.Name: Title
Properties.Summary:
The title of the post.
            It is only used if the post is the initial message (topic).

Properties.Name: Slug
Properties.Summary:
The slug of the post.
            It is only used if the post is the initial message (topic).
            This value is added to the URL in order to identify the topic within the forum.
            If the slug is "my-topic-slug", the URL will be something similar to "www.mysite.com/forum/my-forum/my-topic-slug".

Properties.Name: Content
Properties.Summary: The content of the post.

Properties.Name: RepliesCount
Properties.Summary:
The number of replies to the initial message.
            It is only used if the post is the initial message (topic).

Properties.Name: Status
Properties.Summary:
The status of the post.
            It can be either published or deleted.

Properties.Name: CreatedBy
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier of the user who created the post.

Properties.Name: CreatedOn
Properties.Summary: The time stamp of when the post has been created.

Properties.Name: ModifiedBy
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier of the user who last updated the post.

Properties.Name: ModifiedOn
Properties.Summary: The time stamp of when the post has been last updated.

Properties.Name: Pinned
Properties.Summary:
Value indicating whether the post is pinned or not.
            It is only used if the post is the initial message (topic).
            If pinned, the topic is always shown at the top of the forum page.

Properties.Name: Locked
Properties.Summary:
Value indicating whether the post is locked or not.
            It is only used if the post is the initial message (topic).
            If locked, only users that can moderate a forum will be able to reply to the initial message.

Properties.Name: IsAnswer
Properties.Summary:
Value indicating whether the post is marked as answer or not.
            It is only used if the post is a reply to the initial message.
            If it is an answer, the post is shown at the top of the topic page and marked as the accepted answer.

Properties.Name: HasAnswer
Properties.Summary:
Value indicating whether the post has an answer or not.
            It is only used if the post is the initial message (topic).
            If it has an answer, the topic is marked as answered in the forum page.

Properties.Name: TopicId
Properties.Summary:
The unique identifier of the topic.
            It is only used if the post is a reply to the initial message.

Properties.Name: LastReplyId
Properties.Summary:
The unique identifier of the last reply.
            It is only used if the post is the initial message (topic).

Properties.Name: Topic
Properties.Summary: Reference to the topic.

Properties.Name: LastReply
Properties.Summary: Reference to the last reply.

Properties.Name: Forum
Properties.Summary: Reference to the forum.

Properties.Name: CreatedByUser
Properties.Summary: Reference to the user who created the post.

Properties.Name: ModifiedByUser
Properties.Summary: Reference to the user who last updated the post.

Methods.Name: New
Methods.Summary: Creates an empty forum post.

Methods.Name: CreateTopic
Methods.Summary: Creates a new topic with the given values.

Methods.Name: CreateTopic
Methods.Summary: Creates a new topic with the given values including the unique identifier.

Methods.Name: CreateReply
Methods.Summary: Creates a new reply with the given values.

Methods.Name: CreateReply
Methods.Summary: Creates a new reply with the given values including the unique identifier.

Methods.Name: UpdateDetails
Methods.Summary: Updates the details of the topic.

Methods.Name: UpdateDetails
Methods.Summary: Updates the details of the reply.

Methods.Name: UpdateLastReply
Methods.Summary: Updates the last reply unique identifier if the post is the initial message.

Methods.Name: IncreaseRepliesCount
Methods.Summary: Increases the number of replies of the topic by 1.

Methods.Name: DecreaseRepliesCount
Methods.Summary:
Decreases the number of replies of the topic by 1.
            If the resulting number is less than zero, the value is set to zero.

Methods.Name: Pin
Methods.Summary: Pin and unpin the topic based of the passed value.

Methods.Name: Lock
Methods.Summary: Lock and unlock the topic based of the passed value.

Methods.Name: SetAsAnswer
Methods.Summary: Set the reply as answer.

Methods.Name: SetAsAnswered
Methods.Summary: Set the topic as answered.

Methods.Name: Delete
Methods.Summary: Set the status as deleted.

Methods.Name: IsTopic
Methods.Summary: Indicates if the post is an initial message (topic).

Targets.Name: Post
Targets.Summary:
A forum post is a message created in a forum.
            It can be either the start of a discussion (topic) or a reply to another message.

Optional script to be added at the beginning of the head section of the HTML document.
            It could be used for example to add the Google Analytics script.

Requests.Name: ConfirmUser
Requests.Summary: Request to set the status of a user to active after the email has been confirmed.

Properties.Name: Id
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier of the user.

Properties.Name: IdentityUserId
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier of the user in the membership database.

Properties.Name: Email
Properties.Summary: The email of the user in the membership database.

Properties.Name: Confirm
Properties.Summary:
A value indicating whether the status of the new user needs to be set as active (true) or pending (false).
            When a user registers through the site the value is false because the user needs to confirm the email address before being set as active.
            When an administrator creates a user through the admin are, this value is true and the user is immediately active.

Properties.Name: SiteId
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier of the Site whose the request belongs to.

Properties.Name: UserId
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier of the User who initiated the request.

Methods.Name: New
Methods.Summary: Summary not found.

Requests.Name: CreateUser
Requests.Summary:
Request to create a new user.
            This request is sent right after a user completes the registration in the site.
            If a user is already registered but a profile does not exist yet, this request is sent the first time the user logs in.

Requests.Summary: Request to suspend a user.

Properties.Name: Id
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier of the user to update.

Properties.Name: DisplayName
Properties.Summary: The new display name of the user.

Properties.Name: Roles
Properties.Summary:
The list of roles to be assigned to the user.
            This value is populated only an administrator updates a user.

Properties.Name: SiteId
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier of the Site whose the request belongs to.

Properties.Name: UserId
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier of the User who initiated the request.

Methods.Name: New

Requests.Name: UpdateUser
Requests.Summary: Request to update a user.

Properties.Name: Id
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier of the user.

Properties.Name: IdentityUserId
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier of the user in the membership database.

Properties.Name: Email
Properties.Summary: The email of the user in the membership database.

Properties.Name: DisplayName
Properties.Summary:
The display name of the user.
            It is used as the public name of the user.

Properties.Name: TopicsCount
Properties.Summary: The number of the topics published by the user.

Properties.Name: RepliesCount
Properties.Summary: The number of replies created by the user.

Properties.Name: Status
Properties.Summary:
The status of the user.
            Pending: User is registered but the email is not confirmed.Active: User is registered and the email is confirmed.Suspended: User cannot create new posts (topics or replies).

Properties.Name: TimeStamp
Properties.Summary: The time stamp of when the user has been created.

Properties.Name: Posts
Properties.Summary: The list of posts created by the user.

Properties.Name: Events
Properties.Summary: The list of events generated by the user.

Methods.Name: New
Methods.Summary: Creates an empty user.

Methods.Name: New
Methods.Summary: Creates a new user with the given values.

Methods.Name: New
Methods.Summary: Creates a new user with the given values including the unique identifier.

Methods.Name: Confirm
Methods.Summary: Set the status to active when the user confirms the email address.

Methods.Name: UpdateDetails
Methods.Summary: Updates user's details.

Methods.Name: IncreaseTopicsCount
Methods.Summary: Increases the number of topics by 1.

Methods.Name: IncreaseRepliesCount
Methods.Summary: Increases the number of replies by 1.

Methods.Name: DecreaseTopicsCount
Methods.Summary: Decreases the number of topics by 1.

Methods.Name: DecreaseRepliesCount
Methods.Summary: Decreases the number of replies by 1.

Methods.Name: Suspend
Methods.Summary:
Sets the status of the user as suspended.
            The user will no longer be able to write new posts.

Methods.Name: Reinstate
Methods.Summary: Re-activates the user if suspended.

Methods.Name: Delete
Methods.Summary: Sets the status of the user as deleted.
